attributes.action: look at ways of fining or punishing parents of children who commit anti social behaviour. We the undersigned that this would reduce  the levels of ant social behaviour rapidly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drunken kids in parks making peoples lives hell. Youths demandng more faclities then destroyng them . The only way of tackling anti social behaviour is to make the parents pay. Then perhaps they would know where ther children are and what they are doing. Simple really not rocket science
